The most wonderful and beautiful place in Seoul! Just an amazing secret paradise with an incredible view (special mention for the sunshine😉🌄). I often came to work in a peaceful environment, and the owner always offered me one of her homemade cakes. So delicious. She is so kind😖🥰. Even if we don't speak the same language, we sometimes chatted, and I loved those moments so much.   For my last days in Korea, I came one last time to Travel Coffee for a Cookie Cream Smoothie, and she gave me warm and yummy croissants (with a lot of butter😋, just how I like them as a French girl from Brittany😁). After coming 3-4 times a week for four months, I'm so sad to leave Korea. Bye Travel Coffee, I'll come back to see you soon, and thank you so much for the ice cream you gave me on a hot day in Seoul—it saved my life😍. 접기
